name: 劉碩雅
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
週數	日期	進度
1	2/18	Listening Part 1: Photos	U 1 & 8
Brainstorm / Predict statement / Focus on verbs
2	2/25	Reading Part 5: Incomplete Sentences	U 5 & 12
Determine part of speech / Familiarize with
phrasal verbs
3	3/4	Listening Part 2: Question-Response	U 2 & 9
Listen for key words, distractors, and
similar-sounding words
4	3/11	Reading Part 6: Text Completion	U 6 & 13
Examine the text / grammar / identify adjectives
and adverbs & comparatives
5	3/18	Listening Part 3: Conversations	U 3 & 10
Predict the context / Types of questions
6	3/25	Reading Part 7: Reading Comprehension U 7 & 14	         Read questions first / Types of questions
7	4/1	Listening Part 4: Talks	U 4 & 11
Appearing Themes / Listen for answers in order
8	4/8	Review
9	4/15	期中考: Practice Test 1
10	4/22	Listening Part 1: Photos	U 15 & 22
Listen for SVO pattern and wrong prepositions
11	4/29	Reading Part 5: Incomplete Sentences	U 19 & 26
Learn about prefixes and suffixes / Pronouns
12	5/6	Listening Part 2: Question-Response	U 16 & 23
Listen for vocabulary common to requests /
repeat answer choices
13	5/13	Reading Part 6: Text Completion	U 20 & 27
Watch for word clues
14	5/20	Listening Part 3: Conversations	U 17 & 24
Relate the answer choices / Listen for information
in denial statements
15	5/27	Reading Part 7: Reading Comprehension U 21 & 28	         Do easier questions first / check illustrations /
watch for connected information
16	6/3	Listening Part 4: Talks	U 18 & 25
Look for related words in different forms
17	6/10	Review
18	6/17	期末考: Practice Test 2
materials: Tactics for TOEIC: Listening and Reading Test, Oxford Press
